related_post.text: Is it possible to .join() after certain amount of repetitions?

so_post.text: Something like `'\'.join( .join(names) for names in chunks(champions 3))` should do it (where `chunks` is anything from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/312443/howdoyousplitalistintoevenlysizedchunks)

comments: Seems like the question leads to this SO link as response.
